main.name: Sabrina Lokman
main.bio: My name is Sabrina, I'm a Mechatronics Engineer with two years of experience in Aerospace, Biomedical and Manufacturing Industry. I love solving complex problems and I thrive in a fast-paced environment.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details.

education.description: Specialization in Mechatronics, Solid Mechanics and Design. Minor in Robotics and Mechatronics. Extracurricular in University of Toronto Robotics Association (UTRA)

work.title: Systems Designer
work.description: Primary V & V Engineer in iAssist Knee V2 Pod Solution

work.title: Mechanical Design Engineer
work.description: Designed control panels for Boeing 737MAX cockpit simulator

work.title: Experienced Engineering Consultant
work.description: Mechatronics Consultant working full-time on client site

work.title: Mechatronics Engineer
work.description: IoT Machine Monitoring system specialist and tools designer

testimonials.text: I have always known Sabrina to be creative, hard-working and eager to learn. I have worked with a lot of young professionals, and she is the one who always asks for more challenges. Sabrina's skills as a Mechatronics Engineer with her determination and persistence in a project would be an asset to a team.
testimonials.user: Mandana Afrasiabi - Lead Electrical Engineer, Amaris Consulting

testimonials.text: I've worked with Sabrina on development projects and her contribution to the team have been great. Her focus and attention to details have been key to meet our design requirements within deadlines. Given how fast she learned and adapted to our culture, I am certain that her next team will be more than happy to have her in their team.
testimonials.user: Christian Michelin - Lead Mechanical Engineer, TRU Simulation, Textron
